name: Maduro Robusto
additionalNotes:
Cuban Paradise manufactures artisan cigars at their beachfront shop in St. Petersburg, FL.  The family members personally hand roll the cigars.  Flamboyan Imports distributes these cigars and maintains a limited stock of aged cigars on hand.

http://www.flamboyanimports.com/products/133-cuban-paradise-maduro.aspx
